title: Handle an In-Flight Medical Emergency
description: A passenger is experiencing a medical emergency in-flight. The cabin crew must respond and coordinate with the flight crew and ground support.

tasks.description: Assess the passenger's condition and provide first aid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Cabin crew provides immediate medical assistance.

tasks.description: Make a PA announcement asking if there is a doctor or other medical professional on board.
tasks.expected_outcome: A doctor on board volunteers to assist.

tasks.description: Contact the airline's ground-based medical advisory service via satellite phone for expert advice and inform the captain of the situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Crew communicates with medical experts and the captain to decide if a diversion is necessary.
